name: Melty
description:
Controls:

A/D - Move Left/Right
Space/W - Jump

Description:

In Melty it is your Challenge to climb as high as possible in a given time. The higher you get the warmer it gets. The warmer it is the more slippery you become.

Credits:

Game Design:  0x00c, Fezumlix
Programming: Fezumlix, 0x00c

(this is a submission to the "Mini Jame Gam 5")
